name: workflow
description: a collaborative real-time white- and kanban board
author: Mark-Andr√© Hopf <mhopf@mark13.org>

scripts.build: npm run build:idl && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.test: npm run build:idl && karma start --browsers ChromeHeadless config/karma-unit.conf.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run build:idl && karma start --browsers ChromeHeadless --singleRun=false --autoWatch=true config/karma-unit.conf.js | grep -v '^Chrome Headless .* LOG:'
scripts.test:watch:none: npm run build:idl && karma start --singleRun=false --autoWatch=true config/karma-unit.conf.js
scripts.test:watch:browser: npm run build:idl && karma start --browsers Chrome --singleRun=false --autoWatch=true config/karma-unit.conf.js | grep -v '^Chrome .* LOG:'
scripts.test-ui: npm run build:idl && rollup --config config/rollup-test-ui.config.js && mocha --require ts-node/register 'test/ui/**/*.spec.ts'
